ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03

Interface Filterable<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BrowsableInventories, FriendsList, Inventory

    public interface Filterable<T>
    Filterable allows a collection of some data to have filters applied to it that will change what gets returned by getFilteredItems. This is useful for views that dont want to modify data, but just relieve filtered data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFilter(Filter filter)
      Add a filter to the data, this may or may not modify what is returned by getFilteredItems()
      void clearFilters()
      Remove all filters from the data, this may or may not modify what is returned by getFilteredItems().
      T getFilteredItems()
      Get the filtered T back from the model, this will be a subset of the non-filtered data.
      void removeFilter(Filter filter)
      Remove a filter from the data, this may or may not modify what is returned by getFilteredItems().

    • Method Detail

      • addFilter

        void addFilter(Filter filter)
        Add a filter to the data, this may or may not modify what is returned by getFilteredItems()
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter you wish to apply

      • removeFilter

        void removeFilter(Filter filter)
        Remove a filter from the data, this may or may not modify what is returned by getFilteredItems().
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter you wish to remove

      • clearFilters

        void clearFilters()
        Remove all filters from the data, this may or may not modify what is returned by getFilteredItems().

      • getFilteredItems

        T getFilteredItems()
        Get the filtered T back from the model, this will be a subset of the non-filtered data.
        Returns:
